Leslie Stannage Design | LSD

I contracted as a freelancer for Leslie Stannge Design in Belfast City center working on various freelance gigs, mainly focusing on Wordpress Development, Email Marketing and CMS Redesigns

I worked with large tourism boards like Tourism Ireland, Goverment related companies and Northern Irish Hotel chains.

One of my favourite comapanies that we worked with was Stratagem NI, a Northern Irish business that's core focus is helping organisations influence politics, politicians & public policy.

During my time with L-S-D I worked on a redesign of their webiste and built a Political Monitoring system using HTML Emails and a bespoke CMS.
